title: Thomas Jefferson Memorial: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The Thomas Jefferson Memorial is under the jurisdiction of National Mall and Memorial Parks. For all press and media inquiries, please email our Public Affairs Office or call 202-245-4676.         Contact Public Affairs  Contact the Public Affairs office by email or by calling 202-245-4676.  General Visitor Inquiries For general visitor questions, email, call 202-426-6841, or write to: National Mall and Memorial Parks 900 Ohio Drive, SW Washington, DC 20024           Press Releases and Media Advisories Check out our News Releases page to get the latest information straight from the source.          Social Media Follow along and share your story @NationalMallNPS #NationalMall Twitter Facebook YouTube
